item.title: 观看：一项调查显示，欧元区上个月的商业活动出现复苏迹象，该集团占主导地位的服务业自7月份以来首次出现扩张，抵消了制造业的深度萎缩。
item.description:
WATCH: Business activity in the euro zone showed signs of recovery last month as the bloc's dominant services industry expanded for the first time since July, offsetting a deeper contraction in manufacturing, according to a survey https://t.co/R9v8wPLcXt pic.twitter.com/B6G0tYTX8j

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局表示，它发现波音公司和供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 的生产存在许多问题。美国联邦航空管理局在审计中发现，这两家公司多次未能遵守生产质量控制要求
item.description:
The Federal Aviation Administration said that it had found numerous issues with production at Boeing and supplier Spirit AeroSystems. Its audit found multiple instances where the companies failed to comply with manufacturing quality control requirements https://t.co/rtH1VT2UER pic.twitter.com/3NENm1n1pG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：日本日经 225 指数终于突破了 1989 年创下的最高纪录。MarketVector 的 Steven Schoenfeld 解释了为什么他认为市场条件已经发生了足以吸引更多外国投资者的变化。
item.description:
WATCH: Japan's Nikkei 225 has finally scaled past a record high last reached in 1989. MarketVector's Steven Schoenfeld explains why he thinks market conditions have changed enough to entice more foreign investors pic.twitter.com/oq4VLf63oz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观看：印度最有价值的汽车制造商塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors）的股价创下历史新高，此前一天该公司表示将分拆为两家上市公司，将商用车业务与乘用车业务分开。
item.description:
WATCH: Shares of Tata Motors, India's most valuable carmaker, hit a record high, a day after the company said it will split into two listed firms, separating its commercial vehicle business from its passenger vehicle arm https://t.co/Oo3YlNQMkW pic.twitter.com/mDSg1OxkUw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 看研究公司 Counterpoint 的数据显示，2024 年前六周，苹果公司在中国的 iPhone 销量同比下降了 24%，原因是这家美国公司面临着来自华为等国内竞争对手的日益激烈的竞争。
item.description:
WATCH: Apple's iPhone sales in China fell 24% year-on-year in the first six weeks of 2024, according to research firm Counterpoint, as the US company faced increased competition from domestic rivals such as Huawei https://t.co/Vl64DHJKmA pic.twitter.com/FzCSkyjaGn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局称，该局对波音公司和供应商 Spirit AeroSystems 公司进行的 737 MAX 生产审计发现，两家公司涉嫌多次违反制造质量控制要求

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 5, 2024
